PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10762024-10-10ECCC
ActCanada Water Act
PrecisAppointment of DANIEL WOLFISH of Ottawa, Ontario, to be President of the Canada Water Agency, on an Interim basis, to hold office during pleasure for a term of 18 months, or until such time as a new President is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective October 15, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of DANIEL WOLFISH of Ottawa, Ontario, to be President of the Canada Water Agency, on an Interim basis, to hold office during pleasure for a term of 18 months, or until such time as a new President is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective October 15, 2024.
